sentence.Network_en: Those are expressly designed to illustrate the vagaries of Leibnizian notation.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些是用来说明莱布尼兹记号的巧妙想法.

sentence.Network_en: The policy adopted in this book is to disallow Leibnizian notation within the text.
sentence.Network_cn: 本书采用的办法是在正文中不用莱布尼兹记号.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...词语形成中最优化法则的“看不见得手”理论程式完全是莱布尼兹式（Leibnizian）的乐观主义的：我们生活在“所有可能世界的最好世 …
...他在画册的文章《我们是很多》的题目所暗示的那样，与莱布尼茨（Leibnizian）单分体的聚合很是接近——不同的个体聚合在一起…

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz or to his mathematics or philosophy
